item.title: Everything you always wanted to know about mathematics (2013) [pdf]
Whistleblower drops 100 GB of Tesla secrets to German news site
item.description: - A whistleblower leaked over 23,000 internal files from Tesla to a German news outlet, revealing a pattern of dangerous Autopilot glitches allegedly ignored by the company.

item.title: AI Canon
item.description: - The AI Canon is a collection of resources that cover the most important parts of modern AI.

item.title: How to Finetune GPT-Like Large Language Models on a Custom Dataset
item.description: - Learn how to fine-tune large language models (LLMs) on a custom dataset using Lit-Parrot, a nanoGPT based implementation of the GPT-NeoX model that supports StableLM, Pythia, and RedPajama-INCITE model weights.

item.title: Firefox displayed a pop-up ad for Mozilla VPN over an unrelated page
item.description: - Firefox displayed a pop-up ad for Mozilla VPN on top of an unrelated page, disabling the rest of the Firefox UI until closed.

item.title: War Is a Racket (1935)
item.description: - 'War Is a Racket' is a famous booklet by Major General Smedley Butler, an ex-high-ranking Marine.

item.title: Colorado repealed law limiting municipal internet
item.description: - Colorado has repealed a law that limited municipal internet and required voters' permission to build advanced broadband internet service in their communities, making it easier for local governments to explore broadband options.

item.title: Show HN: Visual intuitive explanations of LLM concepts (LLM University)
item.description: - LLM University has created visual and intuitive explanations of LLM concepts.

item.title: Deno 1.34: Deno compile supports NPM packages
item.description: - Deno 1.34 release focuses on improving compatibility with npm and Node.js, enhancing overall quality of life and developer experience, and establishing the foundation for future performance improvements.

item.title: Implementing a distributed key-value store on top of implementing Raft in Go
item.description: - A post explaining how to implement a distributed key-value store on top of implementing Raft in Go.
